hanzi-su-wiki:
釈

Значения

Объяснять, разъяснять; развязывать; освобождать, комментировать

Мнемоника

Выпускать преступника с контролем 尺 следов 采 его деятельности с составлением отчётов.

Варианты

释, 釋
purpleculture_pinyin:
shì
Japanese variant of 释
Японский вариант толкования
rtega_mnemonic:
釈釈RSinterpret, elucidate, release
  • make one logical step 尺 after another like walking 釆
釋
heisig_constituent: explanation, animal tracks, drop, rice, shaku-hachi, flag, stick
koohiiStory1: Animal track primitive: As expected, animal tracks were left in place of the trail of rice I´d purposely dropped the night before. EDIT - also try the footprint for a primitive meaning, the classic symbol of detective films. STORY: This shakuhachi player is so talented, he can do interpretations of animal noises too. They´re so realistic he soon has animal tracks leading straight to wherever he´s playing.
koohiiStory2: An interpretive dance of some kind where somebody follows animal tracks, a shakuhachi providing the soundtrack, suggesting the tracker's thoughts and intentions.
jp_example_words: 解釈(かいしゃく): explanation, interpretation
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Kill a shrimp with a sickle and you'll need a really good explanation for yourself. What did that shrimp do to you? Why use a sickle? Well? What's your explanation?
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Try to come with an explanation for picking up a sickle and cutting the head off a shrimp with it.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: In your explanation you blame everything on Shaq (しゃく). He told you to do it! It's all Shaq's fault, you explain.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture Shaq popping into your head as you struggle to come up with an explanation for me. Picture Shaq's face. This is payback for Shaq Fu, you think, as you finalize the rest of the explanation in your mind.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 訳 (わけ、ヤク объяснение, толкование, перевод)
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 尸 (труп), 米 (рис), 釆 (ногомэ)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a shaku (尺) of topped rice (釆) needs an explanation

shì
яп. вм. 释
Radicals: 釆, 尺  (sickle, shrimp)
Meaning Mnemonic
Kill a shrimp with a sickle and you'll need a really good explanation for yourself. What did that shrimp do to you? Why use a sickle? Well? What's your explanation?
Try to come with an explanation for picking up a sickle and cutting the head off a shrimp with it.
Reading Mnemonic
In your explanation you blame everything on Shaq (しゃく). He told you to do it! It's all Shaq's fault, you explain.
Picture Shaq popping into your head as you struggle to come up with an explanation for me. Picture Shaq's face. This is payback for Shaq Fu, you think, as you finalize the rest of the explanation in your mind.
